about_the_game:
"Good luck down there, Spelunker. You're going to need it."



A modern RPG MAKER nightmare set in a desolate landscape of a crumbling software.



Solve oblique and confusing puzzles inside the remnants of forgotten games. Discover and decrypt their strange way of living and religion. Ascend, it's all they want you to do anyways.



Communicate with it's disfunctional residents, who are unimaginable creatures who take the form of common household items and furniture. They're also British (Gross!).



2 hour - 9999 hour playtime

content_descriptors.notes:
HInt to physcial harm, and abuse. 
Lots of threatening.
Archaic influence.

detailed_description:
"Good luck down there, Spelunker. You're going to need it."



A modern RPG MAKER nightmare set in a desolate landscape of a crumbling software.



Solve oblique and confusing puzzles inside the remnants of forgotten games. Discover and decrypt their strange way of living and religion. Ascend, it's all they want you to do anyways.



Communicate with it's disfunctional residents, who are unimaginable creatures who take the form of common household items and furniture. They're also British (Gross!).



2 hour - 9999 hour playtime
name: IOUA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7. (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU.
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7. (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
